list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ افْتَحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ
list.meaning: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me

list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
list.meaning: O Allah, I ask You from Your favor.
list.reference: Al-Hâkim (1/218), Al-Baihaqî (2/442) and Al-Albânî declared it ĥasan in Silsilah Al-Ahâdîth Aŝ-Ŝaĥîĥah [2478](5/624)

list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
list.meaning: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers

list.dua: غُفْرَانَكَ
list.meaning: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.

list.dua: بِسْمِ اللهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ، وَلاَحَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
list.meaning: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

list.dua: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللهِ رَبَّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
list.meaning: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.

list.dua: بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَموتُ وَأحْيَا
list.meaning: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.

list.dua: اَلحَمدُ لِلهِ الَّذِي أحيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أمَاتَنَا وَ إِلَيهِ النُّشُورُ
list.meaning: Praise is to Allah Who gives us life after He has caused us to die and to Him is the return.

list.dua: اَللّٰهُمَّ اِنَّی لَکَ صُمْتُ وَبِکَ اٰمَنْتُ وَعَلَيْکَ تَوَکَّلْتُ وَعَلٰی رِزْقِکَ اَفْطَرْتُ
list.meaning: O Allah! I fasted for you and I believe in you and I put my trust in You and I break my fast with your sustenance.

list.dua: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغيثُ
list.meaning: Oh Everliving, The Everlasting, I seek Your help through Your mercy.

list.dua: اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللہَ رَبِّی مِنْ کُلِّ زَنْبٍ وَّ اَتُوْبُ اِلَیْہِ
list.meaning: I seek forgiveness from Allah for all my sins and turn to Him.

list.dua: اَللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي مِنَ النَّارِ
list.meaning: O Allah, save me from the fire (Jahannam).

list.dua: اَلحَمدُ لِلهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَولٍ مِنِّي وَ لَا قُوَّةٍ
list.meaning: Praise is to Allah Who has clothed me with this (garment) and provided it for me, though I was powerless myself and incapable.

list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الحَمدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشِّرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
list.meaning: O Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it (i.e. the garment), I ask You for the good of it and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil for which it was made.

list.when: said to someone wearing new clothes
list.dua: تُبْلِي وَيُخْلِفُ اللهُ تَعَالَى
list.meaning: May you wear it out and Allah replace it (with another).

list.dua: بِسْمِ اللهِ
list.meaning: In the name of Allah.

list.dua: بِسْمِ اللهِ
list.meaning: In the name of Allah.

list.dua: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَّا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
list.meaning: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, Alone, without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.

list.when: Supplications related to the Athân (call to prayer)
list.dua: يَقُولُ مِثْلَ مَا يَقُولُ المُؤَذِّنُ إلَّا فِي «حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاةِ» وَ «حَيَّ عَلَى الفَلاحِ» فَيَقُولُ: «لَا حَولَ وَ لَا قُوَّةَ إلَّا بِاللهِ».
list.meaning: One repeats just as the muadhdhin (One who calls to prayers) says, except when he says “come to prayer” or “come to success”, one should say “There is no might nor power except with Allah”.

list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ بَاعِدْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ خَطَايَايَ كَمَا بَاعَدْتَ بَيْنَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ، اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّنِي مِنْ خَطَايَايَ، كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ الأَبْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ، اللَّهُمَّ اغْسِلْنِي مِنْ خَطَايَايَ، بِالثَّلْجِ وَالْمَاءِ وَالْبَرَدِ.
list.meaning: O Allah, distance me from my sins just as You have distanced The East from The West, O Allah, purify me of my sins as a white robe is purified of filth, O Allah cleanse me of my sins with snow, water, and ice.

list.dua: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِيمِ (ثلاثا)
list.meaning: How perfect my Lord is, The Supreme. (Three times)

list.dua: سَمِعَ اللَّهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهُ
list.meaning: May Allah answer he who praises Him.

list.dua: سُبْحَانَ رَبَّيَ الأَعْلَى (ثلاثا)
list.meaning: How Perfect my Lord is, The Most High. (Three times)

list.dua: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي، رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
list.meaning: My Lord forgive me, My Lord forgive me.

list.dua: التَّحِيَّاتُ لِلَّهِ، وَالصَّلَوَاتُ، وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللَّهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللهِ الصَّالِحِينَ،. أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
list.meaning: Al-Tahiyyât is for Allah. All acts of worship and good deeds are for Him. Peace and the mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you O Prophet. Peace be upon us and all of Allah’s righteous servants. I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.

list.when: Dua for the Prophet (SAWS) after the Tashahhud
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ، اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ، كَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ، إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ
list.meaning: O Allah, send prayers upon Muhammad and the followers of Muhammad, just as You sent prayers upon Ibrahim and upon the followers of Ibrahim. Verily, You are full of praise and majesty. O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad, just as You send blessings upon Ibrahim and upon the family of Ibrahim. Verily, You are full of praise and majesty.

list.dua: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ (ثلاثا)
list.meaning: I ask Allah for forgiveness (Three times)

list.when: after the last Tashahhud and before the Taslîm
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَمِنْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ، وَمِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ
list.meaning: O Allah, I take refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, from the torment of the Fire, from the trials and tribulations of life and death and from the evil affliction of Al-Masîh Ad-Dajjâl.

list.when: immediately after the Taslîm of the Witr Ŝalâh
list.dua: سُبْحَانَ المَلِكِ القُدُّوسِ (ثَلاثَ مَرَّاتٍ، وَ الثَّالِثَةُ يَجْهَرُ بِهَا وَيَمُدُّ صَوْتَهُ يَقُولُ:[ ربِّ المَلائِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ])
list.meaning: How perfect The King, The Holy One is (Three times, and on the third time the Prophet would raise his voice, elongate it and add: [Lord of the angels and the Rûĥ.]).

list.dua: أَسْأَلُ اللهَ العَظِيْمَ، رَبَّ العَرْشِ العَظِيْمِ، أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ [سَبْعَ مَرَّاتٍ]
list.meaning: I ask Allah The Supreme, Lord of the magnificent throne to cure you. (Seven times)

list.when: Supplication of the sick who have renounced all hope of life
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالرَّفِيْقِ الأعْلَى
list.meaning: O Allah, forgive me, have mercy upon me and unite me with the higher companions.

list.dua: إذَا عَادَ الرَّجُلُ أخَاهُ المُسْلِمَ، مَشَى فِي خِرَافَةِ الجَنَّةِ حَتَّى يَجْلِسَ، فَإذَا جَلَسَ غَمَرَتْهُ الرَّحْمَةُ،  فَإنْ كَانَ غُدْوَةً صَلَّى عَلَيْهِ سَبْعُونَ ألْفَ مَلَكٍ حَتَّى يُمْسِيَ، و إنْ كَانَ مَسَاءً صَلَّى عَلَيْهِ سَبْعُونَ ألْفَ مَلَكٍ حَتَّى يُصْبِحَ
list.meaning: If a man calls on his sick Muslim brother, it is as if he walks reaping the fruits of Paradise until he sits, and when he sits he is showered in mercy, and if this was in the morning, seventy thousand angles send prayers upon him until the evening, and if this was in the evening, seventy thousand angles send prayers upon him until the morning.

list.when: Instruction for the one nearing death
list.dua: لَا إلَهَ إلَّا اللهُ
list.meaning: He, whose last words are 'None has the right to be worshipped except Allah', will enter Jannah.

list.when: for one afflicted by a calamity
list.dua: إِنَّا لِلهِ وَ إِنَّا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُونَ، اللَّهُمَّ أجُرْنِي فِي مُصِيْبَتِي، وَ أخْلِفْ لِي خَيْراً مِنْهَا
list.meaning: To Allah we belong and unto Him is our return.O Allah, recompense me for my affliction and replace it for me with something better.

list.when: for the deceased at the funeral prayer
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْهُ، وَعافِهِ، وَاعْفُ عَنْهُ، وَأَكْرِمْ نُزُلَهُ، وَوَسِّعْ مُدْخَلَهُ، وَاغْسِلْهُ بِالْمَاءِ وَالثَّـلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ، وَنَقِّهِ مِنَ الْخَطَايَا كَمَا نَقَّيْتَ الثَّوْبَ الأَبْيَضَ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ، وَأَبْدِلْهُ داراً خَيْراً مِنْ دَارِهِ، وَأَهْلاً خَيْراً مِنْ أَهْلِهِ، وَزَوْجَاً خَيْراً مِنْ زَوْجِهِ، وَأَدْخِلْهُ الْجَنَّةَ، وَأَعِذْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ القَبْرِ(وَ عَذَابِ النَّارِ)
list.meaning: O Allah, forgive and have mercy upon him, excuse him and pardon him, and make honourable his reception. Expand his entry, and cleanse him with water, snow, and ice, and purify him of sin as a white robe is purified of filth. Exchange his home for a better home, and his family for a better family, and his spouse for a better spouse. Admit him into the Garden, protect him from the punishment of the grave (and the torment of the Fire).

list.when: closing the eyes of the deceased
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِفُلانٍ (باسْمِهِ)، وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَهُ في المَهْدِيِّيْنَ، وَاخْلُفْهُ في عَقِبِهِ في الغَابِرِيْنَ، وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلَهُ يَا رَبَّ العَالَمِيْنَ، وَافْسَحْ لَهُ في قَبْرِهِ وَنَوِّرْ لَهُ فِيْهِ
list.meaning: O Allah, forgive (name of deceased) and raise his rank among the rightly guided, and be a successor to whom he has left behind, and forgive us and him O Lord of the worlds. Make spacious his grave and illuminate it for him.

list.when: for the deceased at the funeral prayer
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْهُ، وَعافِهِ، وَاعْفُ عَنْهُ، وَأَكْرِمْ نُزُلَهُ، وَوَسِّعْ مُدْخَلَهُ، وَاغْسِلْهُ بِالْمَاءِ وَالثَّـلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ، وَنَقِّهِ مِنَ الْخَطَايَا كَمَا نَقَّيْتَ الثَّوْبَ الأَبْيَضَ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ، وَأَبْدِلْهُ داراً خَيْراً مِنْ دَارِهِ، وَأَهْلاً خَيْراً مِنْ أَهْلِهِ، وَزَوْجَاً خَيْراً مِنْ زَوْجِهِ، وَأَدْخِلْهُ الْجَنَّةَ، وَأَعِذْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ القَبْرِ(وَ عَذَابِ النَّارِ)
list.meaning: O Allah, forgive and have mercy upon him, excuse him and pardon him, and make honourable his reception. Expand his entry, and cleanse him with water, snow, and ice, and purify him of sin as a white robe is purified of filth. Exchange his home for a better home, and his family for a better family, and his spouse for a better spouse. Admit him into the Garden, protect him from the punishment of the grave (and the torment of the Fire).

list.when: for the deceased child at the funeral prayer
list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْهُ فَرَطاً وَذُخْراً لِوالِدَيْهِ، وَشَفِيْعاً مُجَاباً، اللَّهُمَّ ثَقِّلْ بِهِ مَوَازِيْنَهُمَا، وَأَعْظِمْ بِهِ أُجـُورَهُمَا، وَأَلْحِقْهُ بِصَالِحِ المُؤْمِنِيْنَ، وَاجْعَلْهُ في كَفَالَةِ إِبْرَاهـِيْمَ، وَقِهِ بِرَحْمَتِكَ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيْمِ، و أبْدِلْهُ دَاراً خَيْراً مِنْ دَارِهِ، و أهْلاً خَيْراً مِنْ أهْلِهِ، اللهم اغْفِرْ لأسْلاَفِنَا، وَ أفْرَاطِنَا، وَ مَنْ سَبَقَنَا باِلإيْمَانِ
list.meaning: O Lord, make him a preceding reward and a stored treasure for his parents, and an answered intercessor. O Allah, through him, make heavy their scales and magnify their reward. Unite him with the righteous believers, place him under the care of Ibraheem, and protect him by Your mercy from the torment of Hell. Give him in exchange a better residence and a better family than his. O Allah, forgive our ancestors and our descendants and those who came before us with faith.

list.dua: إِنَّ لِلَّهِ مَا أَخَذَ، وَلَهُ مَا أَعْطَى، وَكُلُّ شَيءٍ عِنْدَهُ بِأَجَلٍ مُسَمَّىً...فَلْتَصْبِرْ وَ لْتَحْتَسِبْ
list.meaning: Verily to Allah, belongs what He took and to Him belongs what He gave, and everything with Him has an appointed time.

list.when: Placing the deceased in the grave
list.dua: بِسْمِ اللهِ، وَعَلَى سُنَّةِ رَسُولِ اللهِ
list.meaning: In the name of Allah and upon the sunnah of the Messenger of Allah.

list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَهُ، اللَّهُمَّ ثَبِّتْهُ
list.meaning: O Allah, forgive him, O Allah, protect him.

list.dua: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمْ أَهْلَ الدِّيَارِ، مِنَ المُؤْمِنِيْنَ، وَالْمُسْلِمِيْنَ، وَإِنَّا إِنْ شَاءَ اللهُ بِكُمْ لَاحِقُونَ، [وَ يَرْ حَمُ اللهُ المُسْتَقْدِمِيْنَ مِنَّا وَ المُسْتَأخِرِيْنَ] أسْألُ اللهَ لَنَا وَلَكُمْ العَافِيَةَ
list.meaning: Peace be upon you all, O inhabitants of the graves, amongst the believers and the Muslims. Verily we will, Allah willing, be united with you, we ask Allah for well-being for us and you.
